name: Let's Worm
description: Let's Worm is in a league of its own. You can even lose during the tutorial! It's casual but hardcore. A cutscene-based story where the controls are simple, but the gameplay complex.
minimum_requirements: İşletim Sistemi: Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 İşlemci: 1.8 GHz Bellek: 512 GB RAM Ekran Kartı: 256 MB VRAM Depolama: 176 MB kullanılabilir alan
recommended_requirements: Önerilen: İşletim Sistemi: Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 İşlemci: 2.1 Ghz Bellek: 1 GB RAM Ekran Kartı: 512 MB VRAM Depolama: 176 MB kullanılabilir alan
